Package view

Class ViewController<VM extends ViewModel>

java.lang.Object
view.ViewController<VM>
Type Parameters:
VM - the concrete ViewModel to be used in this view controller
Direct Known Subclasses:
GameViewController, LoginViewController, MainViewController, RoomViewController, WinViewController
public class ViewController<VM extends ViewModel> extends Object
A general class that defines the base structure of a ViewController and should be extended by concrete view controllers.
Version:
1.1.0 - May 2024
Author:
Alexandru Tofan

    ViewController()
    Constructor invoked by FXML on load, should be empty.

  • Constructor Details

    • ViewController

      public ViewController()
      Constructor invoked by FXML on load, should be empty.

  • Method Details

    • init

      public void init(ViewHandler viewHandler, VM viewModel, Region root)
      A method to be used for initialization after the controller was loaded. Can be overriden by subclasses to add other initialization code. In that case the super class init should be called first.
      Parameters:
      viewHandler - the application view handler
      viewModel - the view model to be associated with this controller
      root - the FXML root

    • stop

      public final void stop()
      A method called by the ViewHandler before opening a new view. It delegates to this controllers ViewModel and can be used for clean-up.

    • reset

      public final void reset()
      A method used to reset view data by delegating to the ViewModel.

    • getRoot

      public final Region getRoot()
      A getter for the FXML root of this view
      Returns:
      the FXML root Region
